sentences.sContent: He was held incommunicado in prison for ten days before being released without charge.
sentences.sCn: 在被不予指控释放前，他在监狱里被单独监禁了10天。

trans.tranCn: 禁止通信的, 被单独囚禁的
trans.tranOther: If someone is being kept incommunicado, they are not allowed to talk to anyone outside the place where they are
